description.value: Concepts describing the purpose of the Da Vinci Alert Communication Profile. These concepts represent a 'starter set' an will be supplemented with additional concept in future versions

description.value: True if an element is considered 'abstract' - in other words, the code is not for use as a real concept

definition.value: The purpose or content of the communication is a prescription refill request.
The purpose or content of the communication is a progress update.
The purpose or content of the communication is to report labs.
The purpose or content of the communication is an appointment reminder.
The purpose or content of the communication is a phone consult.
The purpose or content of the communication is a summary report.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about an event. Usage Note: This is a high level code and should not be used in the value set - it is a grouper code for notifications of any kind

The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about an admission. Usage Note: The included child codes correspond to the Encounter.class codes drawn from v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActEncounterCode.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about an admission to the Emergency department Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'EMER'.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about an admission to a hosptial or equivalent facility. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'IMP'

The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about an admission for observation, because they require a significant period of treatment and monitoring to determine whether or not their condition warrants an inpatient admission or discharge. In the majority of cases the decision about admission or discharge will occur within a time period determined by local, regional or national regulation, often between 24 and 48 hours. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'OBSENC'

The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about an admission to a healthcare facility (e.g. a practitioner, aTMs office, clinic setting, or hospital) on a nonresident basis. The term ambulatory usually implies that the patient has come to the location and is not assigned to a bed. Sometimes referred to as an outpatient encounter. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'AMB'
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about upcoming services at a healtcare facility. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'PRENC'

The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about an admission to to a health care facility for a predetermined length of time, usually less than 24 hours. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'SS'

The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a discharge. Usage Note: The included child codes correspond to the Encounter.hosptialization.dischargeDisposition codes drawn from FHIR code ssytem discharge-disposition

The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about an admission to to a health care facility for a predetermined length of time, usually less than 24 hours. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.hosptialization.dischargeDisposition code 'home'

The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a discharge to the patient's home environment. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.hosptialization.dischargeDisposition code 'snf'

The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a discharge to a long-term care facility. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.hosptialization.dischargeDisposition code 'long'

The purpose or content is an alert or a notification that the patiened died during the encounter. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.hosptialization.dischargeDisposition code 'exp'

The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a discharge to a post-acute care rehabilitation facility. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.hosptialization.dischargeDisposition code 'rehab'
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a referral for consultation.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a change in treatment - either the start or the end.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about lab results being available.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a problem that is applicable to a treatment the patient is receiving such as drug or device recall or reported issue.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a Device having been ordered for the patient.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a change to the Prior Authorization (Pended to Approved/Denied).
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a new diagnosis / condition.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about changes occurring in the care team.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about changes in insurance coverage, either the start or the end.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about change in the social circumstances of the patient (Social Determinants of Health).
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a Public Health event.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about the start of an outpatient encounter.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about either the birth or death of the patient.
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about a change in prescription status for a medication at the pharmacy (Pickup, Restock, Dispense).
The purpose or content is an alert or a notification about healthcare services that are rendered under Workman's Compensation rules.
